articles.title: Euro 2020: Are Czech Republic finally ready to surpass Euro 96 high point? - BBC Sport
articles.description: A second golden generation? A chance to surpass Euro 96? Are the Czechs ready to spring another surprise at the European Championship?
articles.content:
The Czech Republic began and ended Euro 96 with defeats by Germany but memorably knocked out France and Portugal

articles.title: Goldman Sachs makes two big predictions about Europe's economic recovery - CNBC
articles.description: Experts at Goldman have laid down their predictions for an expected recovery in the euro zone, highlighting when they believe the ECB will lift its stimulus measures.
